math.name: Math

exponent-rules.description: Problems involving the basic rules of exponents, including multiplication, division, power of a power, negative exponents, and more.

productOfPowersRule.description: Problems involving the product of powers rule, which states that a^m * a^n = a^(m+n).

exponentLogarithmConversion.description: Problems involving converting between exponential and logarithmic forms. Example: Convert b^y = x to log_b(x) = y.
